title: Mixy Money
author: Mixy Money
created_time: June 26, 2023, 04:22:44 PMLast edit: June 26, 2023, 05:24:11 PM by Mixy Money
content: Quote from: ¬† ‚û• The cleanest coins from the Cutest Bitcoin Mixer /][Mixy Clearnet] & /][Tor Mirror]  &  /#faq][Mixy FAQ] & /#contacts][Contacts]/]/][banned mixer] is the best BTC mixer and is built on a unique self-written algorithm that provides real cleaning of your Bitcoins. We actually purify bitcoin, not send coins from one user to another. All the coins you get, come directly from exchanges, pass any purity tests, and completely anonymize your actions. üê±¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Summary‚û• No logs (no logs at all).‚û• You do not need registration to work with us. You are completely anonymous.‚û• We do not use KYC in our work. We dont care about AML, cause you came to us to clear them.The coins you want to clear go to our props. Within hours, they are mixed by repeatedly sending them to thousands of different addresses. After that, the money is sent to the exchanges for the final break in the chain of ties. After 3-6 hours, you will receive back absolutely clean coins that cannot be associated with the coins you sent earlier. We guarantee that all AML tests are passed and that the coins received are completely unassociated with you.We charge between 3% and 5% of the amount + a flat fee of 0.0007 BTC. The minimum amount to clear is 0.003 BTC, the maximum is 50 BTC. If you need to clear a large amount, you can do it in several transactions, or contact the operator directly, we will definitely find a solution, (you can use the telegram bot or write to us at [banned mixer] (at) proton.me).We issue digitally signed letters of guarantee, which is a one hundred percent guarantee of safety of your money. The letter of guarantee is insurance against disputable situations. It consists of two parts: the guarantee text and our digital signature. Be sure to keep this letter, you may need it in case of disputable situations, (do not send a letter of guarantee to us on Bitcointalk).Our site is open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. If you have a disputable situation - our technical support will promptly solve any of your questions, (our operator will help you as soon as possible). Please note that our corporate account on Bitcointalk cannot handle any disputes, so use telegram bot only, or contact us by /[banned mixer]@proton.me]email.____________________Code:Contacts: https://t.me/MixyMoneyBot, [banned mixer](at)proton.meClearnet: https://[banned mixer]/Tor Mirror: http://[banned mixer]/Quote from: [banned mixer] ¬†  ¬† /]

comments.body: We have returned! üê±Unfortunately, we have lost access to the old account, so from now on this is our official Bitcointalk account.Please keep in mind that in case of disputes, you should send a letter of guarantee ONLY to our e-mail or telegram bot.Quote from: Mixy Money on June 26, 2023, 04:22:44 PMCode:Contacts: https://t.me/MixyMoneyBot, [banned mixer](at)proton.me

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Welcome back! The design of this thread is great!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Welcome back.Is there any particular reason why you wrote the email address as "[banned mixer](at)proton.me" and not the usual way?

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 26, 2023, 07:57:40 PMWelcome back.Is there any particular reason why you wrote the email address as "[banned mixer](at)proton.me" and not the usual way?It was I who created bbcode for them, and did it so that the email address would not be indexed by Google.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: welcome back...You should try to change your Bitcointalk ANN link in your home page as it is still anchored to your old thread.

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Welcome back! I hope this time you will succeed, and I will follow and use your mixer.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: Just seeing this campaign for the first time and I have this feeling that it will go a long way... No offence, The spreadsheet Hardly opens, why?

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Welcome back joining the mixer industry, the Logo is cute, or maybe because I'm a cat person. Anyway, if you need Indonesia Translation feel free to Write a PM

comments.body: Quote from: Sexylizzy2813 on June 26, 2023, 09:47:30 PMJust seeing this campaign for the first time and I have this feeling that it will go a long way... No offence, The spreadsheet Hardly opens, why?This is ANN and not a campaign thread.If you have questions regarding the campaign, please ask them in the appropriate thread.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: You people are operating two ANN threads therefore, I will want you guys to lock one and open the other for easy communications. This is the former one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415483.new#new which I was busy engaging myself over there a good Samaritan saw me alone there in the wilderness and dropped the new ANN thread there for me to come out from the desert . A passerby examplens is the one who rescued me from the abandoned ANN thread. I thanks him for that.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on June 27, 2023, 01:03:14 PMYou people are operating two ANN threads therefore, I will want you guys to lock one and open the other for easy communications. This is the former one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415483.new#new which I was busy engaging myself over there a good Samaritan saw me alone there in the wilderness and dropped the new ANN thread there for me to come out from the desert . A passerby examplens is the one who rescued me from the abandoned ANN thread. I thanks him for that.However, I will transfer this to the original thread, so as not to unnecessarily bump the old one, which will not be in useAgbe, They haven't access to @mixymoney forum account, OP of old thread. So because of that they open a new account and create a new ANN thread. Without access to @mixymoney forum account, also is not possible to lock this old thread.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.created_time: June 27, 2023, 01:55:26 PMLast edit: June 27, 2023, 03:38:35 PM by Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 27, 2023, 01:42:16 PMAgbe, They haven't access to @mixymoney forum account, OP of old thread. So because of that they open a new account and create a new ANN thread. Without access to @mixymoney forum account, also is not possible to lock this old thread. ¬† That is alright. But they (the company) would have contacted the first account user to give them the login details instead of creating double jeopardy for the same purpose. Now that the former thread can't be locked and can't be use, what do you think will happen to the two account? Now @mixymoney representative of the new ANN account will be trying to stop people from using the old account but they can't because the thread there is still open and the website contained the link of the old thread so if people clink on the link in the website they would be directed to the old thread and not the new one. So I advise that they should insert the link of the old thread in the OP of the new thread and advise people not to engage themselves on the old thread but for the new thread.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: I just visit your site and maybe better to English it by default.So I came across here because just read if you mixing coins from the exchange, What specific exchange did you mean?I don't see the usual service, After I provide a bitcoin address, the website directly goes to the sent address without setting how much fee and anonymity like another mixer. So how can I set the time to receive the mixed coin, like 1, 2, 3 ... hours?So far so good, I don't have a problem when exploring the whole.

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: Welcome back, using a funny icon, it makes your mixer more interesting and hopefully your campaign runs successfully.To take your mixer wage as 3%-5%, means this cost varies, is there a certain category/amount BTC of how someone who uses your mixer service can find out how much they have to spend?Quote from: blue Snow on June 28, 2023, 01:53:00 AMI just visit your site and maybe better to English it by default.About the use of language, I agree that using English as a default, especially to carry out marketing globally, unless targeted only for local users with the same language, although I can take translation options on my machine, but use local language for global services I think it is less ethical.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Mixy Money, Obviously, two things that you have to correct on the site, that is setting EN language as default and updating the link to the new Bitcointalk ANN thread. Or these remarks will be repeated in every next post. icopress, (I believe you have notifications), maybe you can influence that when you contact the Mixy Money team.Quote from: Agbe on June 27, 2023, 01:55:26 PMBut they (the company) would have contacted the first account user to give them the login details instead of creating double jeopardy for the same purpose. Now that the former thread can't be locked and can't be use, what do you think will happen to the two account? You certainly reject the possibility that they tried everything to gain access to the old account. Why is it so hard to accept? Why is it even important now what will happen with those two accounts? Are you worried that they overloaded the server?For a moment, you reminded me why we see some twisted product instructions like link or link

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 28, 2023, 07:43:29 AMMixy Money, Obviously, two things that you have to correct on the site, that is setting EN language as default and updating the link to the new Bitcointalk ANN thread. Or these remarks will be repeated in every next post. icopress, (I believe you have notifications), maybe you can influence that when you contact the Mixy Money team.Quote from: Agbe on June 27, 2023, 01:55:26 PMBut they (the company) would have contacted the first account user to give them the login details instead of creating double jeopardy for the same purpose. Now that the former thread can't be locked and can't be use, what do you think will happen to the two account? You certainly reject the possibility that they tried everything to gain access to the old account. Why is it so hard to accept? Why is it even important now what will happen with those two accounts? Are you worried that they overloaded the server? First of all thank you very much for understanding my side of the comments, I have said that also for them to change it. And I have not rejected what you told me earlier about accessing the old account, I accepted all you said, but I was also making some contribution for the development of the website and the company but icopress misunderstood me and judged me from his anger. Yes I am not from English speaking country, but I can communicate with someone with English for the person's understanding, though in the process of communicating I would make mistakes. Since when I came, I have not engaged user for a long discussion like I am doing with you. Because I take you and someone who understands me. I never say anything bad about Mixy Money, I was only saying what they should do and also trying to know why And I don't know that had offended someone. Sorry for that if I have done that. I was only trying to create a conversational scene because that is the most interesting part in the forum. Forum without discussion is boring.icopress I am trying my best. Someone that ask questions learn faster.

comments.author: Mixy Money
comments.body: Many thanks to everyone for such a lively conversation! We have already updated the link on the site (now it leads to this thread).We will also seriously think about the proposals that have been received, including the default English setting.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What is new in this service or the mechanism of work, in the sense of how the mixing process takes place, and how strong is the mixing?Why did you mention the 3-hour period, is it the least, and how do you guarantee money laundering regulations, as it cannot be guaranteed unless your currencies come from mining farms or central financial services, and here it is easy to track.How does the user ensure that his data will not be recorded?I am amazed at the number of mixes that come from Russia, is the demand for cryptocurrency that high?

comments.author: khiholangkang
comments.body: Quote from: Mixy Money on June 28, 2023, 09:42:59 AMMany thanks to everyone for such a lively conversation! We have already updated the link on the site (now it leads to this thread).We will also seriously think about the proposals that have been received, including the default English setting.Thank you for fixing it, it completed the confusion that was previously questioned and discussed, because if it was not resolved it confuted people.Maybe you should as soon as possible to change the default language, thank you for working hard.Quote from: hugeblack on June 28, 2023, 09:56:17 AMI am amazed at the number of mixes that come from Russia, is the demand for cryptocurrency that high?Russians have contributed a lot in the mixer industry, I don't know what the foundation is why it happens.It seems that indeed in Russia gets a very high crypto request, many issues that I heard that the Russian pro government will be crypto, but even so crypto in Russia cannot be used for payment tools.
